title: The mandatory prayers
transcript: please tell me briefly how many Salah in five days time in the five uh Daily Times if I just pray Salat because of some kind of limit limitation will it be accounted that I did perform most likely the questioner is asking about what's mandatory and what's not the mandatory prayers are the five daily prayers F composed of two composed of four composed of four composed of three and composed of four these are the mandatory and obligatory prayers for you to pray anything else is voluntary it is not mandatory and if you skip it you're not sinful but if you pray it Allah will reward you and would complete any missing bits and pieces of your mandatory prayer that you may have neglected or you may have wandered away while doing it and Allah knows
